title: Leper

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- At night, choose a player to Intimidate. If they attempt to attack someone tonight, you redirect them to yourself.
- At night, choose to Meditate. You heal 3 stress. Your defense is lowered to none tonight. 3 Uses.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- You aren't informed of whether you successfully redirect someone, only that you are attacked.
- You have 2 basic auto-vests. You can't gain any more from other roles.
